fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives: Children's Rights and Child Protection in the context of EU Justice and Home Affairs, Development Policy and External Affairs. EU Digital Agenda, including Safer Internet for Children. EP Inter-group on children's rights.
membership:
Olivia Lind Haldorsson works together with Rebecca O'Donnell through the informal collaboration under O'Donnell&Lind (www.odonnell-lind.eu) 
 
Olivia Lind Haldorsson is co-founder and President of Child Circle, www.childcircle.eu
customers: UNICEF# Council of Europe# ChildFund Alliance
goals__remit:
To promote children's rights on behalf of children's rights actors. 
 
To develop and support implementation of strategy, policy and organisations in the area of human rights/children's rights.
